full_text:
Not to be a downer, but I have never seen a photo taken by the  
Luminator that did not appear to me to be more than a long or  
otherwise distorted exposure (I'm very unclear of the effects  
whatever it is the device supposedly does to a camera mechanism). I  
wish that wasn't the case, but until I see one of these images that  
convinces me otherwise, I have to be honest about it.

Ann
